```{r}

projects <- read_excel(path, sheet = "projects") %>%
    mutate(
        project_org = glue::glue("**{project}** -- {organization}"),
        outcomes = glue::glue("- {bullets}"))

```

## Selected Research Contributions

```{r}
#| results: asis

for (i in seq_len(nrow(projects))) {
    project <- projects$project_org[i]
    outcomes <- projects$outcomes[i]
    cat(project, "\n\n")
    cat(outcomes, "\n\n")
}

```
